评论概述: NOT COLOR FAST. WASH AND DRY SOLO.
评论详情: Bought the purple peacock size small. Beautiful and comfortable. Perfect fit. I am small, and it is hard to find pants that go small enough, but fortunately these run shorter than most other boho pants I looked at. Lightweight with nice pockets.  However, they are not color fast at all. The purple color immediately turned my water purple when I washed them and leaked onto the bathtub where I left them to dry. The dye also ran a little into the patterns on the waist while drying, though the pattern is busy enough that no one will notice. I recommend hand-washing every pair by themselves and laying them flat out in a bath tub or something to dry. If they are touching other clothes while drying, they will probably stain the other clothes. They may also stain what you dry them on; you can wash the color off a tub but maybe not a wooden drying rack. Laying them flat instead of hanging may reduce the dye running and affecting the patterns, though this position will also take longer to dry. I would hesitate to put these in a washing machine, but if you do, they should be the only item in the cycle.  Unless your goal is to tie dye your other clothes, in which case, go for it.
For pants supposedly to go up to XXL these fit but barely.

评论概述: They fit -- if you're three inches shorter than you really are
评论详情: First of all, I wear a US size 16. I ordered a 2X in this pant because I just KNEW they'd be cut small.  What I didn't think about what that they'd be cut SHORT as well.  I'm keeping them because I bought them with points.  BUT, if you want a pair of harem pants that actually reach BELOW your ankle, these are not the ones.  BTW, I'm 5'6", 200 pounds.  Oh, and the washing instructions?  Ha ha, you'd think these things were made of paper -- you can't put them in the washer or dryer, can't iron them, can't use fabric softener, etc. etc. etc.  Overall, it's a dang good thing I didn't pay "real" money for them and I don't recommend that you do either.
